Text: hiHi Lindy Laura McGuire and I were talking about you today Remember we were working on Florabama and we met her for lunch and it was pouring down rain She was in my office today for a meeting and it took us a while to remember how we knew each other She got married in January I think her new last name is Heckman Anyway I was thinking about you and I hope youre doing well thru all this Enron mess How is Sam talking up a storm already Take care Susan
